entry.title: Tuesday: Flurries at times heavy. Temperature steady near minus 8.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy ending this afternoon then mainly cloudy. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind west 30 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 8. Wind chill minus 18 this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Tuesday 27 December 2022
